de.iabg.swing
Interface Logger

All Known Implementing Classes:
HistoryPanel, StatusPanel
public interface Logger

This interface declares basic functionality for an object that can log events. The ability to add Loggable objects allows the Logger to update the log from multiple sources. Typically, a Logger will register listeners on a Loggable object and simply listen for string messages.

Version:
September 10, 2008
Author:
Adam C. Dick, BSE

          Removes a Loggable object from this Logger.
 void updateLog(java.lang.String log)
          Updates the log of the given Loggable object
